name: Slime Run (Erik Prinz)
description:
Slime Run is a short puzzle experience in which you simultaneously control several creatures made of slime trying to reach a specific goal. As creatures move around each level, they leave a trail of slime in their wake which eats away at their body. To win, you must guide all creatures to the goal without any of them withering away completely.

Slime Run is an experimental puzzle game prototype built over the course of 2 weeks by a student game designer.

Created by Erik Prinz
